archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Verify Product Configuration
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process verifies whether the customer is using the purchased product offering correctly. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory Verifies whether the customer is using the purchased product offering correctly.
